data.message: Hi....i nasty comment was put on my cousins post, can u pIn point and locate where it was sent from.... I.e city???

replies.message: Hi Mark. If your cousin is being bullied or harassed on Facebook, please report it: http://bit.ly/29vzqsp. You can also find tips and resources to help deal with bullying and harassment here: http://bit.ly/29vzx7B and on our Bullying Prevention Hub: http://bit.ly/29ukDSz. Please keep in mind that if you feel someone is in immediate danger, you should contact your local authorities. We hope this helps! -Kevin
Big deal....it's Facebook grow up....stop crying like a baby...learn how to not let words hurt...
